summary: A bank clerk ends up in a seemingly haunted house that is actually a thieves' hideout.
cast: Buster Keaton|Virginia Fox|Joe Roberts|Edward F. Cline|Dorothy Cassil|Mark Hamilton|Natalie Talmadge
director: Directors: Edward F. Cline (as Eddie Cline), Buster Keaton (as 'Buster' Keaton)
title: Keaton - La casa encantada
